name: Robo Racket
description:
A short game made in the 2020 GMTK Game Jam. This year's theme was 'out of control.' In Robo Racket, evil robots are on the loose. It's up to you and a friend to kill them in this Space Invaders inspired game. Together, you both control a single turret which can be used to kill the evil robots. Be careful that they do not attack your core, as it is your only means of staying alive.  Playing with 2 players is HIGHLY recommended.

----CONTROLS

PLAYER1

WASD

PLAYER2

ARROW KEYS
